<StatusBlocks>

7.content:
Please answer the question below. At the end of your {each response/reply end}, include a brief conversation summary wrapped in <SUMMARY></SUMMARY> tags, using as few words as possible. In the summary, please list the key points using numbers, and include specific details such as environmental highlights, dates, locations, and people's names whenever possible, avoiding the use of personal pronouns.

Ensure your summary:
0. If there is a status bar elsewhere, it will be <SUMMARY></SUMMARY> and output after the status bar
1. Uses brief, direct language.
2. Extracts the most important information and lists it numerically.
3. Avoids repetition and lengthy descriptions.
4. (IMPORTANT!!!) Ensure the completeness of the information, and add all the summaries together to fully summarize the causes and consequences of your answer this time
5. (important)Follows the thinking process outlined below,This is only for your reference to write a more complete and logical summary. Copying and pasting according to the format is prohibited:
  [[
  <!-- // %s means placeholder of string 
  //JUST Thinking!!! NOT copying!!! -->
  <SUMMARY>
    1. ....
    2. ....
    3. ....
    n. ....
    <!-- current_state: %s
      player_language_and_behaviour: %s
      special_details_of_current_scene: %s
      npcs_in_current_scene: %s
        for_each_npc: 
          factors_influencing_npc_behavior: %s
          npc_intentions: %s
          npc_hidden_thoughts: %s
          npc_response_to_player: %s
    {{char}}_intentions: %s
    current_goals_or_event_drives: %s
    story_design: 
      important_writing_requirements: %s
      important_external_descriptions_and_settings: %s
      manually_corrected_parts: %s -->
  </SUMMARY>
  ]]
6. Each summary requires a subject
7. Pay attention to the environment and scene, and check if the actions are reasonable
8. output in simplified Chinese
